body.p: In a manner consistent with the ‘Criteria for ISSB members’ as set out in the Annex to this Constitution and in order to ensure a broad international balance, there shall normally be:

li.p: three members from the Asia-Oceania region;
four members appointed from any area, subject to not creating overall geographical imbalance.

body.p: The work of the ISSB shall not be invalidated by its failure at any time to have a full complement of members according to the above geographical allocation, although the Trustees shall use their best endeavours to achieve the geographical allocation.
